dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/1: I... I can barely stand. Please, do you have anything to eat?
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/2: Everything's going dark around the edges... I need food, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/3: I don't know how much longer I can go on like this without a meal...
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/4: *clutches stomach* ...I'm sorry, I can't focus on anything right now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/5: If I don't eat something soon, I'm going to collapse right here.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/7: I can't remember the last time I ate. My hands won't stop shaking.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/8: I'd give anything for even a piece of bread right now, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/1: I haven't eaten in ages... do you have anything?
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/3: I can't stop thinking about food right now...
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/4: My stomach has been growling all day. I really need to find something to eat.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/5: I'd trade my best boots for a warm meal right about now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/6: Have you seen any food around? I'm getting desperate, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/7: Sorry if I seem distracted. It's hard to think about anything but food.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/8: I keep eyeing the crops in the fields... they can't grow fast enough.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/1: I could really go for a bite to eat, honestly.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/2: Is it lunchtime yet? My stomach seems to think so.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/3: I've been meaning to grab something to eat. Just haven't gotten around to it.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/4: Something smells good around here... or maybe I'm just hungry.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/5: A nice stew would really hit the spot right about now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/6: I wonder what's for supper tonight? I'm getting a bit peckish.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/1: I can keep this farm going, but I need seeds.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/2: We're out of planting seed. Could someone bring some?
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/3: No seeds left for replanting. I need a fresh supply.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/4: I've got fields ready, but no seeds to sow.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/5: If you want crops soon, please bring seeds.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_seeds/6: Seed stock is empty. I need restocking, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/1: I can't till properly without a hoe.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/2: My hoe supply is gone. I need one to continue.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/3: Fields are waiting, but I don't have a hoe.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/4: Could someone hand me a usable hoe?
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/5: No hoe, no tilling. I need a tool.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_tool/6: I can work as soon as I have a hoe again.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/1: I can't reach part of the farm from here.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/2: Something's blocking my path to the field.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/3: The route to my work area is obstructed.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/4: I need a clear path to keep farming efficiently.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/5: I keep getting blocked trying to reach the crops.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unreachable/6: Could we clear a path to the field, please?
dialogue.chat.farm_request.out_of_scope/: This area is beyond my assigned farm range.
I need to stay near my farm anchor to work.
I can help better if we keep the farm compact.
My assigned farm area ends a bit closer in.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_water_plan: The soil is too dry for good yields. We need irrigation.
I can expand once this field has enough water coverage.
This plot needs a nearby water source before I till more.
Could someone help with irrigation? The farm is too dry.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.no_valid_targ: No urgent farm tasks right now.
Nothing workable at the moment on this plot.
I'm waiting for the next farm task to become available.
The field is stable for now. I'll resume when needed.
dialogue.chat.farm_request.unsupported_c: I found a crop I don't know how to replant yet.
This crop type isn't in my farming routine yet.
I can harvest this, but replanting is unclear.
I need better farming instructions for this crop.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_smoker/: I need a smoker before I can finish these cuts.
No smoker nearby. I cannot cook the meat here.
Set a smoker down and I'll get right to work.
Without a smoker, my work stalls.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/1: I've no fresh meat or fish to cook.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/2: The hooks are empty. I need more to smoke.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/3: Bring raw cuts and I'll have supper ready soon.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/4: Nothing left to put on the fire.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/5: My supplies are spent. I need fresh stock.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_input/6: No raw food on hand right now, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.unsupporte: I don't know how to cook %2$s yet!
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/1: The smoker has gone cold. I need fuel.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/2: No coal or charcoal left for the fire.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/3: I can keep cooking once the hearth is fed.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/4: The fire won't hold without fuel.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/5: Could someone restock fuel for the smoker?
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_fuel/6: I need something to burn before I can continue.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.output_blo: My packs are full. I need chest space.
Cooked meat has nowhere to be stored.
Clear some storage and I can keep working.
I cannot carry another cut until this is stowed.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.unreachabl: I can't reach my smoker from here.
Something blocks the way to my work.
I need a clear path to the smoker.
I keep getting stuck before I reach the fire.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.out_of_sco: I'm too far from my butcher post.
I need to stay near my smoker to work.
This is beyond my work area.
Keep the butcher setup closer and I'll manage it.
dialogue.chat.butcher_request.no_valid_t: No butcher work needs doing right now.
I'll wait by the smoker for the next task.
Nothing to tend at the moment.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/1: My hand is steadier, and my cuts are cleaner now.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/2: I've learned to work the smoker with better timing.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/3: Another day, another step in my craft.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/4: The butcher's trade is coming easier to me.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/5: I can handle finer cuts than before.
dialogue.chat.butcher_progress.tier_up/6: I've grown into a better butcher.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_kitchen/1: I need a proper kitchen before I can cook.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_kitchen/2: There's no kitchen station ready for me.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_kitchen/3: Give me a kitchen and I'll feed everyone.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_kitchen/4: I can't start without a working kitchen.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_ingredient: The pantry's thin. I need fresh ingredients.
I'm short on ingredients for today's meal.
Bring me supplies and I'll keep the pots going.
I've got stations, but nothing to cook.
I need more produce and meat for the kitchen.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_storage/1: Kitchen stores are full; nowhere to put this.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_storage/2: I need empty storage for prepared food.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_storage/3: Clear a chest and I can keep cooking.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.no_storage/4: I can't carry more meals without storage.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unreachable/1: I can't reach my station from here.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unreachable/2: Something is blocking the kitchen path.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unreachable/4: I need a clear path to cook.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unreachable/5: I keep getting stuck before I can work.
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unreachable/6: Could someone clear the way to the kitchen?
dialogue.chat.cook_request.unsupported_i: I don't know how to cook %2$s yet!
